Text: Can anyone seed this really quickly? I'm at 94%, any help would be great! Thank you!
The soundtrack for Mega Man X is just simply awesome! My favorites are probably Spark Mandrill, Storm Eagle, and the Casting Credits. Thanks for this great torrent!!!
Would be great to see uploads of the soundtracks for the other Mega Man games for the SNES. At least Mega Man 7 and X2 have great music, X3 is slightly worse but still ok.

If anyone wants the other X series OSTs, not to mention pretty much every Rockman album ever released, check out http://www.themmnetwork.com/wiki/index.php?title=Music_Archive

Your welcome. ^_-
